group_1.textLeft: Oh, another one...

group_1.textRight: What's up?

group_1.textLeft: I was thinking about the store we just passed by.
I feel like I've been seeing a lot of "shockolates" @on sale today.
Are they in season?

group_1.textRight: Well, "in season" isn't exactly the right term for it...
You see, Valentine's Day is coming up. @That's why there are so many chocolates.

group_1.textLeft: Ballen...@[chara:102501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]what's Day?

group_1.textRight: Valentine's Day! It's a really important occasion.

group_1.narration: Every year, on February 14th,@girls give chocolate to the one they love@ and confess their feelings.

group_1.textLeft: A confession, huh...

group_1.textRight: Aimi is super into it.

group_1.textLeft: Who's that?

group_1.textRight: Oh, she's a friend of mine.
She's been going all out for Valentine's Day.
She says this is gonna be the year she confesses!

group_1.textLeft: So it's a very significant day for girls.

group_1.textRight: Exactly!

group_1.textLeft: Considering its importance, I'd like to participate,
but I don't have anyone to confess to...

group_1.textRight: It's not only for confessing!
You can just give chocolates to the people you love @the most.
It's a way of showing them how grateful you are to @have them in your life.

group_1.textLeft: So it's for the person I love the most...?

group_1.textRight: Wait, you mean you already have someone...?

group_1.textLeft: Well...@just saying it is making me blush, but...

group_1.textRight: Wow... I see, that's how it is! @That's so wonderful, Shizuka!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-wh-what's gotten into you?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*
I guess the friend I mentioned earlier has really @been rubbing off on me.
I've been really keyed into these kinds of things @lately.

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, is there anything else you do aside from @giving shockolates?

group_1.textRight: Well, since you have that special someone, you guys @can go on a date.

group_1.textLeft: A...date?

group_1.textRight: Oh, what's the word...[chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:eyeClose_0][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]an outing!
When you go on an outing with someone you love, @we call that a "date."

group_1.textLeft: So going out with someone is called a "date" here in @the Land of the Rising Sun.
Now I understand!

group_1.textRight: So if your significant other is available that day, why don't you see if you guys can go out somewhere?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
You're right!
I'll ask and see if we can do that.
We don't typically get the chance to go out for fun together,
so I think this is a great opportunity.

group_1.textRight: Go, go! Fight!!@Go get 'em Shizuka!
